Package com.hfych2.brickdestroy.controller

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    DebugConsole
    This class represents the DebugConsole that is shown when user presses 'ALT','F1' and 'SHIFT'.
    This class has been modified from the original code along with having additions to become a controller class.
    It is the controller class for the model GameBoard and the view DebugPanel.
    GameController
    This class is extracted from GameBoard of the original code and has been modified along with having additions.
    This class is the controller class for the model GameBoard and the view GameView.
    It defines the action on keyboard input during the game play.
    It reads and writes to highScoresList.txt.
    It sorts the highScoreList.txt contents and writes to sortedHighScoresList.txt
    HomeMenuController
    This class is extracted from HomeMenu of the original code and modified along with having additions.
    This class is the controller class for HomeMenu.
    This class defines the actions to be performed when HomeMenu options are clicked.
    It calls the enableGameBoard().
    It reads and displays sortedHighScoresList.txt HomeMenuController.readSortedHighScores()
    HomeMenuController.displaySortedHighScores().
    It calls the enableInfoView().
    It terminates the process successfully System.exit(int).
    InfoController
    This class is a newly created class that is not from the original code.
    This class is the controller class for InfoView Defines the action to be performed on key pressed when InfoView is in display.
